DESCRIPTION: Accumulates Evil Deeds while in hand when other cards are played. Requires X Evil Deeds to activate its effect.
Increases the damage of attack cards once per turn. Cute Imps are shared across all allies.
Triggers when the cards on either side in hand are played.
If the #yFear applied to an enemy equals or exceeds their HP, they flee. (You receive rewards as if you won the fight.)
Problem Solver characters refer to #yAru, #yMutsuki, #yKayoko, and #yHaruka.
Temporary allies that participate in combat. Up to four allied characters can exist.
#yFinisher effects trigger at the end of the turn. Only the last #yFinisher card played will activate.
If no Problem Solver characters are present, gain 2 random effects from the list.
Gain that amount of #yBlock at the end of each turn.
Costs of cards drawn are randomized until the end of the turn.
This power always applies to the front character and persists even if the front character dies.
